Description.Text: The 4-star Hospederia Parque de Monfraguee hotel offers stylish accommodation and beautiful grounds nestled seamlessly amongst woodland and mountains. Located between Torrejon el Rubio and the national park of Monfraguees, the hotel affords guests the chance to both relax and seek adventure. Sparsely populated, the surrounding Extremadura countryside offers great opportunities for exploration. The park is known for its birds and biodiversity, as well as a castle and the river Tagus. Carceres is roughly 55km away, where guests can discover an ancient town full of architectural curiosities. Alternatively, the hotel has plenty to offer. The hotel was built with the aim of blending as naturally as possible with the environment. Local materials, consisting mostly of wood and slate, were employed to achieve this. Inside, the hotel has an avant-garde feel, decorated with local artwork and designer furnishings. In addition to an outdoor swimming pool, the hotel boasts a lounge with a billiards table, a large garden and a number of activities in partnership with local businesses, including canoeing and horse-riding. The Paraiso de los Sentidos restaurant serves a delicious selection of local dishes, while benefiting from lovely views. The cafe has comfy sofas and armchairs, offering a great opportunity to kick back with a hot or cold beverage. The Standard guestrooms are designed with a loving attention to detail. Wooden beams, slate walls and a soft autumnal colour scheme bring the rooms into harmony with the outside landscape. Some rooms also come with a balcony. Notable amenities include free Wi-Fi, a computer and an en suite bathroom with bathtub and shower. Parking is possible onsite.
